Container.Description: NZBHydra 2 is a meta search application for NZB indexers, the "spiritual successor" to NZBmegasearcH, and an evolution of the original application NZBHydra . It provides easy access to a number of raw and newznab based indexers.[br][br]The application NZBHydra 2 is currently in its early stages and is in active development.
